column4: Hey I'm kinda new to linux, but I'm trying to get a desktop on my laptop, the problem is the livecd isnt working on it. So I've installed a server edition and would like to "upgrade" it to have a desktop
I tried the minimum install guide from the forum but that doesnt seems to work
i believe you would have been better off using the alternate install disc instead of the server
actually soundray said you can just install the ubuntu-desktop metapackage
